Text:
hey guys since i didn found the Lee Strobel's the case for faith so i found it & thought of sharing

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5436343

Hey guys I found a better one:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3812309/The_God_Who_Wasn_t_There

I heard about this movie from John Todd, an ex-illuminatist who defected from witchcraft and converted to Christianity. He's got some *very* good insider information, and I highly recommend his tapes

FaeGiN, if you want to know the truth, watch "A Case for A Creator". It documents the creationism vs. evolution debate fairly well, and proves its points with logic and common sense rather than "the bible said so". If you want a logical basis for your beliefs, whether you think there's a God or not, you'll find it there.
